---
title: "Fallstudie NYC flighs13"
---


# Setup (Pakete und Daten)
```{r}
library(nycflights13)
data(flights)
library(tidyverse)
library(easystats)
```


# Datensatz aufbereiten

```{r}
flights2 <-
flights %>% 
  select(where(is.numeric), -year, -arr_delay, -arr_time)
```

# Modellieren


```{r}
lm1 <- lm(dep_delay ~ ., data = flights2)
r2(lm1)
```
